scripts.build: npm run lint && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail 'npm run build -w ./frontend' 'npm run build -w ./backend'
scripts.start: npm run stop && npm run clean && npm run build && npm run start -w ./backend && npm run deploy-sanity
scripts.start-yaml-test: npm run stop && npm run clean && npm run build && npm run start -w ./backend
scripts.dev: concurrently 'npm run dev -w ./frontend' 'npm run dev -w ./backend' 'npm run dev -w ./sanity'
scripts.deploy-sanity: npm run lint -w ./sanity && npm run deploy -w ./sanity
scripts.nuke: npm run clean && find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name 'package-lock.json' -type f -delete
